casebody.data:
GOLDSTON & HARRINGTON
v.
STATE & EASLEY. No. 328PA04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. G. Eugene Boyce, Philip R. Isley, Anthony M. Brannon, Raleigh, for Goldston and Harrington. John Maddrey, Norma S. Harrell, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, for State of NC. Robert F. Orr, Pamela B. Cashwell, Jeanette Doran Brooks, Julia F. Youngman, Thomas H. Segars, for NCICL.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of May 2006 by Plaintiffs for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiffs (Goldston and Harrington) shall have up to and including the 15th day of May 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
